ALLCAPS

Class CapsStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • ALLCAPS.CapsStats

  • public class CapsStats
extends java.lang.Object
    The CapsStats class aggregates team statistics. Current and former Washington Capitals team members comprise this class' fields. Methods exist to set and get the roster's stats per season. Methods also exist to sort each season's roster by games played, goals scored, assists made, and points earned. Finally, this class includes two print formatting methods to output each season's team stats.
    Since:
    June 2018

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CapsStats()
      No-argument, comprehensive constructor -- initializes player variables for each season's roster.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void formatTeamInfo(java.util.ArrayList<ALLCAPS.PlayerStats> teamStats)
      outputs the player stats (season start and end year included) for each member of the Washington Capitals' roster
      void formatTeamInfoRegSeason(java.util.ArrayList<ALLCAPS.PlayerStats> teamStats)
      outputs the player stats (season start and end year NOT included) for each member of the Washington Capitals' roster
      java.util.ArrayList<ALLCAPS.PlayerStats> getTeamStats2016()
      returns 2016-2017 season's statistics for the entire Washington Capitals roster.

      returns 2017-2018 season's statistics for the entire Washington Capitals roster.
